TopicTitle: I want to build space stations. But how?

Articles.Content:
Hello . I would like to build space stations and satelites ith those typical solar panels and those strange forms, not only a vertical rocket. I only can do vertical rockets with few parts, all of them vanilla parts: One problem is that I don't know what many of the parts do or what is their effect. I downloaded some mods and plugins, one mod is extraplanetary parts or sometning like that, carts etc.

Is there any good tutorial on how to build any of these? Thanks .
If you don't know what the parts do, read about them on their forum post. To get asymmetrical stations to orbit, balance the weight as best as possible.
or modify their orbits or use gravitsappa
